How to get the golem token
You can find your token here under Fulltext-RSS-Feed. The characters after \"http://rss.golem.de/rss_sub.php?token=\" are your token.
This is not an official golem.de App. If you want to report a bug or have any ideas for improving this application just click here to open our github repository
